metadata.title: CVE-2021-32494 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Radare2 has a division by zero vulnerability in Mach-O parser'srebase_buffer function. This allow attackers to create malicious inputsthat can cause denial of service.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
